home.title: Hello! My name is BesT
home.subtitle: Frontend Developer | coding Enthusiast
home.description1: I love building fast, beautiful, and user-friendly websites, leveraging my experience with frameworks and a focus on great UX.
home.description2: I’m continuously developing my skills to become a Full Stack Developer in the future

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a Frontend Developer
about.description1: Hello! I’m a frontend developer who loves crafting beautiful and practical UIs. I'm passionate about using modern technologies like React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript to build sleek and high-performance websites.
about.description2: I believe in detail-oriented design, clean code, and continuous learning.

contact.title: My Contact
contact.subtitle: Want to work together or talk about a project? You can reach me through any of the channels below.

section1.title: Frontend Developer
section1.subtitle: 2022 – Present
section1.description: Developed responsive websites using React, Next, Vue, Nuxt, Angular, and Tailwind. Collaborated with clients on UI/UX, and deployed with windows Server and Hosting.

section2.title: Backend Developer (Learning)
section2.subtitle: 2023 – Present
section2.description: Built fullstack projects with Node.js, .NET, Golang, and MySQL. Focused on REST APIs and Authentication.

section3.title: IT Student
section3.subtitle: 2020 – Present
section3.description: Studying web development, software engineering, and contributing to open-source class projects.

project.title: Projects
project.descriptionCard1: Real Estate Listing Website Developed a platform for posting listings to buy, sell, rent, and consign all types of assets and real estate.
project.descriptionCard2: Medical Test Result Calculation Website Created a system that processes data uploaded from hospital databases to help identify diseases and recommend patient care guidelines.
project.descriptionCard3: Lat Krabang Metropolitan Police Station Website Developed the official website for the Lat Krabang Metropolitan Police Station.
project.descriptionCard4: HR Management Application Built a comprehensive application for managing HR tasks such as employee records, leave requests, and attendance tracking.
project.descriptionCard5: Earthquake Alert Application Developed an application that provides real-time earthquake alerts.
project.descriptionCard6: API for Cancer Diagnosis Website Designed and developed an API to support a cancer diagnosis platform.
project.descriptionCard7: API for FMone Website Built backend APIs for FMone web system to manage data and user access.
project.descriptionCard8: API for Pets Management Application Developed an API for a pet management app, supporting health tracking and veterinary history.
